<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Knock](/Spells.aspx?ID=168)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 347 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Alseta](/Deities.aspx?ID=30), [Barzahk](/Deities.aspx?ID=138), [Dranngvit](/Deities.aspx?ID=86), [Lao Shu Po](/Deities.aspx?ID=180), [The Deliberate Journey](/Deities.aspx?ID=250), [Urban Prosperity](/Deities.aspx?ID=256)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 door, lock, or container
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You make the target easier to open. _Knock_ grants a +4 status bonus to any creature that tries to open the target door, lock, or container with an Athletics or a Thievery check. You can attempt a Thievery check to open the target as part of casting _knock_, and you add your level even if you're untrained.

 _Knock_ counteracts [_lock_](/Spells.aspx?ID=174).
name: Knock
